name: Ball Blast!
description:
You've never played a block-breaking game like Ball Blast!

Fun, frantic and full of satisfying action, Ball Blast tasks you with destroying the slowly advancing blocks and circles before they reach your shooter!

With your harmonic xylophone orchestra in tow, you must keep the bouncing balls moving without letting them drop off the screen. Aim correctly and see the blocks blast in dramatic fashion!

Ball Blast Features:

• Addictive block-breaking gameplay with a new (upside-down) twist!

• Advance through the increasingly difficult levels and beat your high-score!

• Awesome audio effects for each bump and blast!

• Fun, colourful art style!
